oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate Lt. Jame Riley Long
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Long served with the 4th GA Cav. Rgt., part of Gen. Joseph Wheeler's cavalry command. He survived the war and died on Sept. 5, 1910. Pictured with his rifle, powder flask and horn in front of a hand-sewn CSA battle flag.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Long, Jame Riley
